miniReactProjects.title: OTP Generator
miniReactProjects.description: A simple and responsive OTP (One-Time Password) generator built using React. Easily generate 4-digit or 6-digit OTPs, copy them with a click, and use them in your apps for authentication or testing purposes.

miniReactProjects.title: ClickCount
miniReactProjects.description: A simple and interactive counter app built using React. Tap to increase or decrease the count, and reset it anytime with a single click!

miniReactProjects.title: CineSearch
miniReactProjects.description: A React.js app to search your favorite movies using a public API, showing movie titles, posters, and release years with a clean, responsive UI.

miniReactProjects.title: Feedback System UI
miniReactProjects.description: Built a clean and responsive feedback form using React.js, allowing users to submit device details, photos, and feedback easily.

miniReactProjects.title: CalcuMate
miniReactProjects.description: A simple and responsive React-based arithmetic calculator that allows users to perform basic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, modulus, and power.

miniReactProjects.title: BookHunt
miniReactProjects.description: BookHunt is a React + Vite + TailwindCSS application that allows users to search for books using the OpenLibrary API.

mainProjects.title: ecommerce-react-springboot
description: Full-stack e-commerce app using Spring Boot & React.js with product management, shopping cart, image upload, and keyword search.

mainProjects.title: Task Nest
description: Task Nest – Full-stack task management app built with React and Spring Boot for creating, organizing, and tracking tasks efficiently.

mainProjects.title: ThinkBoard
description: Minimalist MERN-based note-taking app with create/view/delete notes, backend rate limiting, and real-time feedback via react-hot-toast.

mainProjects.title: FlickFinder
description: FlickFinder – Movie search & discovery app built with React (Vite), Tailwind CSS, and Appwrite, using TMDb API for movie data and trending searches.

mainProjects.title: PG LIFE
description: PG Life is a website where user can easily find PG as per their requirement.

mainProjects.title: SMART SOLAR GRASS CUTTER
description: Designed and developed a smart solar grass cutter with autonomous lawn coverage using microcontrollers, sensors, solar, mobile application.
